headline: UBS upgrades Caterpillar as trade risks ease, but macro uncertainty remains
summary: Investing.com -- UBS upgraded Caterpillar (NYSE:CAT) to Neutral from Sell in a note Friday, raising its price target for the stock to $357 from $272 a share.
